SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.api.services

Klasse AddressService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.lat.api.services.AddressService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IAddressService
public class AddressService extends Object implements IAddressService
Service class for managing address entities.

This class implements the IAddressService interface and provides methods for retrieving, adding, and deleting address entities. It interacts with the IAddressRepository to perform CRUD operations on address data.

The service can be initialized with a default repository obtained from the DataController or with a custom repository instance.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

  • Methodendetails

    • getAllAddresses

      public List<Address> getAllAddresses()
      Retrieves a list of all addresses.

      This method calls the repository's method to get all addresses and returns them as a list.

      Angegeben von:
      getAllAddresses in Schnittstelle IAddressService
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of Address objects representing all addresses.

    • getAddressById

      public Optional<Address> getAddressById(int addressId)
      Retrieves a specific address by its ID.

      This method calls the repository's method to get an address by its ID and wraps it in an Optional.

      Angegeben von:
      getAddressById in Schnittstelle IAddressService
      Parameter:
      addressId - the ID of the address to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      an Optional containing the Address if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • addAddress

      public boolean addAddress(Address address)
      Adds a new address.

      This method calls the repository's method to create a new address and returns a boolean indicating success or failure.

      Angegeben von:
      addAddress in Schnittstelle IAddressService
      Parameter:
      address - the Address to be added.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the address was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • deleteAddress

      public boolean deleteAddress(int addressId)
      Deletes a specific address by its ID.

      This method calls the repository's method to delete an address by its ID and returns a boolean indicating success or failure.

      Angegeben von:
      deleteAddress in Schnittstelle IAddressService
      Parameter:
      addressId - the ID of the address to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the address was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
